explanation:
toxdigitvalue: This function is called directly by MHD_str_pct_decode_in_place_lenient_ in the non‑small‑code path. You must inspect its definition (and any functions it calls) to determine whether it can call back to MHD_str_pct_decode_in_place_lenient_ (i.e. produce an indirect recursion cycle).

MHD_str_pct_decode_lenient_n_: This function is invoked by the MHD_FAVOR_SMALL_CODE branch of MHD_str_pct_decode_in_place_lenient_. Its body (and any functions it calls) must be examined to see whether it can call, directly or indirectly, MHD_str_pct_decode_in_place_lenient_ and thus create a recursion cycle.

Note: standard library functions used (e.g. strlen) need not be analyzed for recursion because they will not call back into application code; the two symbols above are the application functions whose definitions are necessary to prove absence/presence of direct or indirect self-calls.
